sys_script_include.name: GetVehicleDetailss

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_e643a96783b12210def956d6feaad33c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1474716_lva.GetVehicleDetailss</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetVehicleDetailss</name><script><![CDATA[var GetVehicleDetails = Class.create();
GetVehicleDetails.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
  getDetails: function() {
    var result = {};
    var sys_id = this.getParameter('sysparm_vehicle_sys_id');

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure('x_1474716_lva_vehicle_inventory'); // update with your real table
    if (gr.get(sys_id)) {
      result.make = gr.vehicle_make.toString();
      result.model = gr.vehicle_model.toString();
      result.year = gr.vehicle_year.toString();
    }

    return JSON.stringify(result);
  }
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-06-04 00:53:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>e643a96783b12210def956d6feaad33c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetVehicleDetailss</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory" source="x_1474716_lva">380367a183a12210def956d6feaad394</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory">380367a183a12210def956d6feaad394</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e643a96783b12210def956d6feaad33c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-04 01:16:30</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
